title: Supreme Court extends stay on trial of BJP chief K Annamalai over alleged hate speech
selftext:
SC Bench of Justices Sanjiv Khanna and Dipankar Datta stay trial against Tamil Nadu BJP president for hate speech against a Christian NGO, when clear video evidence exists.

Same bench also refuses to give bail to Arvind Kejriwal and Manish Sisodia for the Delhi Liquor Policy case, where no money trail exists. 

Same bench also dismisses petitioning against EVM-VVPAT matching.

Earlier a bench consisting of Justices Sanjiv Khanna, M M Sundresh and Bela Trivedi also refused bail to BRS leader K Kavitha in the same case despite little reliable evidence against her.
